title: Step R, Block
description: Step Right (to 3:00) into a Sitting Stance, but keep your chest facing Front (12:00). Side Front Block (Right hand).

title: Block
description: Stay there. Side Front Block (Left hand).

title: Slow Punch
description: Bring Right foot to Left foot (Feet together). Angle Punch: Slowly punch across your chest to the Right (3:00) with your Right fist.

title: Step L, Poke
description: Step Forward (to 12:00) with Left foot. Double finger thrust to eyes (Right hand).

title: Step R, Poke
description: Step Forward (to 12:00) with Right foot. Double finger thrust to eyes (Left hand).

title: Backfist
description: Stay there. Strike Front (12:00) with Right Backfist.

title: Step L, Block
description: Step Forward (to 12:00) with Left foot. Rising Block (Left arm).

title: Step R, Punch
description: Step Forward (to 12:00) with Right foot. Middle Punch (Right fist).

title: Slide Back
description: Slide/Step Backwards (towards 6:00). Land in an L-Stance, but keep facing the Front (12:00). Guarding Block.

title: Kick
description: Low Front Snap Kick (Right foot) to Front (12:00).

title: Spear Hand
description: Land forward in a Low Stance. Spear Finger Thrust to Front (12:00).

title: Ground Kick
description: Drop to your Left Knee. Place both hands on the floor. Execute a High Turning Kick with your Right foot towards the Front (12:00).

title: Ground Punch
description: Land the kicking foot forward. Keep Left hand on the floor. Punch high with Right Fist to Front (12:00).

title: Turn & Elbow
description: Stand up and turn Right (180°) to face the Back (6:00). Strike with your Left Elbow backwards (towards the Front/12:00). Looking over shoulder.

title: Turn & Guard
description: Pivot on your feet, turning Right to face Front (12:00) again. L-Stance. Guarding Block.

title: Step Back
description: Step Backwards (towards 6:00). L-Stance facing Front. Scooping Block (Left palm).

title: Step Back
description: Step Backwards (towards 6:00). L-Stance facing Front. Knife-hand Strike (Right hand).

title: Turn X-Block
description: Turn Left (180°) to face the Back (6:00). Step Left. X-Fist Pressing Block.

title: Knee Kick
description: Grab head and smash Right Knee towards Back (6:00).

title: Turn & Guard
description: Land foot. Turn Left (180°) to face Front (12:00). Guarding Block.

title: Slide & Elbow
description: Slide your Right foot forward. Turn your body to face the Back (6:00). Strike with Right Elbow backwards (towards Front/12:00).

title: Turn & Guard
description: Pivot Left to face Front (12:00). Guarding Block.

title: Side Kick
description: Side Piercing Kick (Right foot) to Front (12:00).

title: Land & Press
description: Land the kick. Pivot to face the Back (6:00). Rear Foot Stance. Twin Palm Pressing Block.

title: Step & Strike
description: Step forward to Back (6:00). High Block, then Backfist Strike (Right hand).

title: Turn & Spear
description: Turn Left (180°) to face Front (12:00). High Spear Finger Thrust (Left hand).

title: Kick
description: Low Front Snap Kick (Right foot) to Front (12:00).

title: Land & Turn
description: Land the kick. Pivot your feet to face the Back (6:00). Slow motion stance preparation.

title: Stamp & Strike
description: Stamp forward to Back (6:00). Back Hand Downward Strike (Left hand).

title: Palm Smash
description: Stay facing Back. Smash Right Fist into Left Palm.

title: Stamp & Strike
description: Step and Stamp forward to Back (6:00). Back Hand Downward Strike (Right hand).

title: Palm Smash
description: Stay facing Back. Smash Left Fist into Right Palm.

title: Turn & Stamp
description: Turn Left (180°) to face Front (12:00). Stamp. Knife Hand Strike (Left).

title: Slip & Backfist
description: Slip (slide) forward towards Front (12:00). Backfist Strike (Right).

title: Step & Stamp
description: Step forward towards Front (12:00). Stamp. Knife Hand Strike (Right).

title: Slip & Backfist
description: Slip (slide) forward towards Front (12:00). Backfist Strike (Left).

title: Turn Low Block
description: Turn Left (180°) to face Back (6:00). Low Reverse Knife-hand Block.

title: 9-Block
description: Slip backwards (towards 12:00) but keep facing Back (6:00). 9-Shape Block.

title: Step Low Block
description: Step forward towards Back (6:00). Low Reverse Knife-hand Block.

title: 9-Block
description: Slip backwards (towards 12:00) but keep facing Back (6:00). 9-Shape Block.

title: Twin Strike
description: Move Right foot backwards. You are now standing at C, looking at C (Back/6:00). Twin Horizontal Knife-hand Strike.

title: Arc-Hand
description: Stay facing Back (6:00). High Arc-hand Strike (Right hand).

title: Kick
description: Front Snap Kick (Right foot) to Back (6:00).

title: Land Arc-Hand
description: Land forward towards Back (6:00). High Arc-hand Strike (Left hand).

title: Kick
description: Front Snap Kick (Left foot) to Back (6:00).

title: Land Punch
description: Land forward towards Back (6:00). Middle Punch (Right fist).

title: Punch
description: Stay there. Middle Punch (Left fist). Fast motion.

title: Twin Knuckle
description: Bring Right foot to Left. Feet together facing Back (6:00). Twin Fore-knuckle Fist Punch (Crescent shape to sides).

title: Turn Left
description: Turn Left to face the Right Wall (3:00). Step out. Low Knife-hand Block.

title: Open Punch
description: Stay there. High Open Fist Punch to Right Wall (3:00).

title: Turn Right
description: Turn Right (180°) to face the Left Wall (9:00). Step out. Low Knife-hand Block.

title: Open Punch
description: Stay there. High Open Fist Punch to Left Wall (9:00).
